awd_titl_txt: Seismic Instrumentation for Introductory Geophysics         Laboratory
awd_abstract_narration: This award to Indiana University's Department of Geology                   is made in response to a proposal submitted to the National                     Science Foundation's Instrumentation and Laboratory Improvement                 Program. The award will provide one-half of the funds needed to                 acquire a portable seismograph. The University is committed to                  matching the NSF contribution for this equipment.                                    The acquisition of the seismograph will allow the department               to design a set of laboratory and field exercises for an                        introductory geophysics course intended to teach field methods in               seismic mapping and analytical techniques for processing and                    interpreting seismic refraction and reflection measurements.
